commit.message:
Revert "add WarningsAsMessages, WarningsAsErrors, WarningsNotAsErrors and Tre…"

This reverts commit 4dff69ff4896943c4bf06f7434efddc2b6e36913.

nodes.body: This whole changewave is now missing from the docs, are we just not having the 17.14 changewave in 17.12?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -23,9 +23,6 @@ A wave of features is set to "rotate out" (i.e. become standard functionality) t
 
 ## Current Rotation of Change Waves
 
-### 17.14

nodes.body: I think so. It was not supposed to be there originally, then we put it in for my PR. So now there is no reason to have it there anymore.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -23,9 +23,6 @@ A wave of features is set to "rotate out" (i.e. become standard functionality) t
 
 ## Current Rotation of Change Waves
 
-### 17.14

nodes.body: Sounds OK to me - for doc the main should anyway be the source of truth
